title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for if a = 1/16 or a = 1/8

1 point is earned if shows a does not work

f(4) = 1 implies that a = 1/16 and f'(4) = 2a(4) = 1 implies that a = 1/8. Thus, f cannot satisfy (ii).
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for if a = 1/16 or a = 1/8

1 point is earned if shows a does not work

f(4) = 1 implies that a = 1/16 and f'(4) = 2a(4) = 1 implies that a = 1/8. Thus, f cannot satisfy (ii).

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for if a = 1/16 or a = 1/8

1 point is earned if shows a does not work

f(4) = 1 implies that a = 1/16 and f'(4) = 2a(4) = 1 implies that a = 1/8. Thus, f cannot satisfy (ii).

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for if a = 1/16 or a = 1/8

1 point is earned if shows a does not work

f(4) = 1 implies that a = 1/16 and f'(4) = 2a(4) = 1 implies that a = 1/8. Thus, f cannot satisfy (ii).

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the value of c

g(4) = 64c - 1 = 1 implies that c= 1 32 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AD8@

When c= 1 32 , g ′ ( 4 )=3c ( 4 ) 2 − 2( 4 ) 16 =3( 1 32 )( 16 )− 1 2 =1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@563E@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for the explanation

g ′ ( x )= 3 32 x 2 − x 8 = 1 32 x( 3x−4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A9F@

g'(x) < 0 for 0 < x < 4/3, so g does not satisfy (iii).
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the explanation

g ′ ( x )= 3 32 x 2 − x 8 = 1 32 x( 3x−4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A9F@

g'(x) < 0 for 0 < x < 4/3, so g does not satisfy (iii).

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for 4 n k =1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca aI0aWaaWbaaSqabeaacaWGUbaaaaGcbaGaam4AaaaacqGH9aqpcaaI Xaaaaa@3A9F@

1 point is earned for values for k and n

1 point is earned for verification

h(4) = 4 n k MathType@MTEF@5@5@@38DC@ = 1 implies that 4 n =k. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A84@

h'(4) = n 4 n−1 k = n 4 n−1 4 n = n 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45BF@ = 1 gives n = 4 and k= 4 4 =256. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D90@

h( x )= x 4 256 ⇒h( 0 )=0. h ′ ( x )= 4 x 3 256 ⇒ h ′ ( 0 )=0 and  h ′ ( x )>0 for 0<x<4. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6A10@

1 point is earned for values for k and n

1 point is earned for verification

h(4) = 4 n k MathType@MTEF@5@5@@38DC@ = 1 implies that 4 n =k. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A84@

h'(4) = n 4 n−1 k = n 4 n−1 4 n = n 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45BF@ = 1 gives n = 4 and k= 4 4 =256. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D90@

h( x )= x 4 256 ⇒h( 0 )=0. h ′ ( x )= 4 x 3 256 ⇒ h ′ ( 0 )=0 and  h ′ ( x )>0 for 0<x<4. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6A10@

The student response earns one of the following points:
